description: The Cappadocian Maple (Acer cappadocicum) is a truly remarkable tree with amazing features. Its rare, unique form and delicate foliage make it an enthralling sight throughout the year. It is native to Turkey, and its foliage erupts into vivid red and orange displays in autumn, contrasting beautifully against its distinctive, deeply-ridged bark. Its relatively compact size and easy maintenance make it suitable for a variety of locations - perfect for those who donâ€™t have a large garden but still want to enjoy the beauty of this majestic tree. Its resistance to disease, air pollution and quick growth rate mean it's a great choice for a low-maintenance, long-term feature in any outdoor space.
